segments.text: I am looking into a kitchen scene, a simple line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Three people are inside: an adult woman and two children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective is slightly angled, showing the sink area to the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be daytime, with light streaming through a window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The most striking thing is the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running continuously, pouring over the basin's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, however, seems completely oblivious to this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is drying a plate, her attention fully on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already in the water, yet she shows no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is perfectly neutral, almost serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see stacked dishes on the counter to her right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, a calm garden is visible, a stark contrast to inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
